data.text: @Hio77nz @mattchannz @nz_liam @farmgeek Under mycovidrecord there is a section where you can report a +/- test result for anyone over 12. Signing up to that ( where you got your covid passport from)required realme or passport etc kids under 11 you have to ph in but the ph line has been that busy no one can get through.

@mattchannz @nz_liam @farmgeek Had an interesting conversation with a friend this weekend... They caught covid, and so their kids also got it.

Apparently the system doesn't allow reporting a RAT without a unique realme. And calling up, they were told not to worry about the kids stats!
@VPoingdestre1 @intactive @farmgeek That's exactly my point.... he 100% didn't die of Covid (he was shot dead), but yet he was recorded as a Covid death.... that's what's bullshit!

@bradj126 @farmgeek I'm sure the 112 were admitted to hospital with COVID as compared to the rest who were there for other reasons. At least that's how I interpret the x amount of people testing pos x amount in hospital. Seems logical to read it that way
@bradj126 @intactive @farmgeek How is that proof of anything. He didn't die of COVID, stop with the bullshit

@azlancat @farmgeek You need to go to your appointment, mask up, sanitize, lather yourself in sanitizer if you want but please go to your appointment. Either way it's obviously your choice but worrying about it will only damage your health more. Take care
@intactive @farmgeek The real question is how many of them actually died from Covid? Not many, if any....
@bradj126 @farmgeek We've had 56 deaths (far lower per capita than most countries because he waka eke noa, we're all in this together). How many of them were shot?
